name: source
Pewter: Allomancer's pewter an alloy of 91% tin and 9% lead though pewter in general can be alloys of tin with other metals such as silver and copper

name: description
Pewter: In allomancy, pewter is considered an internal, physical, pushing metal. Burning pewter enhances one's physical attributes, including strength, durability, dexterity, flexbility, balance, and rate of recovery. The pairing for pewter is tin.

name: book source
Pewter: The Final Empire, Chapter 7; The Final Empire, Ars Arcanum; The Final Empire, Allomancy Alphabetical Reference
